[[Image:MOHAA Omaha Beach.png|thumb|''Allied Assault'''s Omaha Beach mission.]]
 
'''''Medal of Honor: Allied Assault''''' ('''''MoHAA''''') is a [[first-person shooter]] (FPS) [[Video game|computer game]] developed by [[2015, Inc.]] and created by [[Steven Spielberg]]<ref>{{cite web|url= http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/medal-of-honor-allied-assault/credits |title=Medal of Honor credits | accessdate=2008-02-27}}</ref>. It is the 3rd installment of the [[Medal of Honor series]]. The game, based on the [[id Tech 3|Quake III Arena]] engine with modifications from [[Heavy Metal: F.A.K.K.Â²]], simulates [[infantry]] [[combat]] in the [[European Theater of World War II|European]] and North African Theaters during [[World War II]]. ''Allied Assault'' is the first game in the [[Medal of Honor series]] to be released for [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], and the only one to be [[porting|ported]] to [[Linux]].
'''''Medal of Honor: Allied Assault''''' ('''''MoHAA''''') is a [[first-person shooter]] (FPS) [[Video game|computer game]] developed by [[2015, Inc.]] and created by [[Steven Spielberg]]<ref>{{cite web|url= http://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/medal-of-honor-allied-assault/credits |title=Medal of Honor credits | accessdate=2008-02-27}}</ref>. It is the 3rd installment of the [[Medal of Honor series]]. The game, based on the [[id Tech 3|Quake III Arena]] engine with modifications from [[Heavy Metal: F.A.K.K.Â²]], simulates [[infantry]] [[combat]] in the [[European Theater of World War II|European]] and North African Theaters during [[World War II]]. ''Allied Assault'' is the first game in the [[Medal of Honor series]] to be released for [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], and the only one to be [[porting|ported]] to [[Linux]].
